mapper.select: SELECT TDV.GENE_DV , TDA.GENE_CD , TDA.GENE_CD_DESC , TDA.GENE_CD_DESC2 , TDA.USE_YN , TDA.CREATE_USER , TDA.CREATE_TIME , TDA.UPDATE_USER , TDA.UPDATE_TIME , TDV.PW_USE_YN FROM T_CD_GENE_DV TDV INNER JOIN T_CD_GENE_DATA TDA ON TDA.GENE_DV = TDV.GENE_DV WHERE 1 = 1 AND TDV.GENE_DV = #{GENE_DV} AND TDV.USE_YN = #{USE_YN} AND TDA.USE_YN = #{USE_YN}
